M. Welling
dcterms:description: The MNIST dataset is a well-known benchmark dataset for image classification tasks, consisting of handwritten digits from 0 to 9. It is commonly used to evaluate the performance of machine learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: M. Ernoult
J. Grollier
D. Querlioz
Y. Bengio
B. Scellier
dcterms:description: The FashionMNIST dataset is a dataset for image classification that consists of 70,000 grayscale images of clothing items, such as shirts, shoes, and bags. It serves as a more challenging alternative to the MNIST dataset.
dcterms:title: FashionMNIST
